original_text: When he had spoken to me according to these words, I turned my face toward the ground and was mute.
korean_text: 그가 이런 말로 내게 이를 때에 내가 곧 얼굴을 땅에 향하고 말문이 막혔더니

sentences.original_text: When he had spoken to me according to these words
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 말씀으로 내게 말씀하셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: I turned my face toward the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 얼굴을 땅으로 향하게 하고
